alert.note: Alert for Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Polk and east central Hillsborough Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 310 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plant City, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Plant City, Brandon, Fish Hawk, Lakeland Linder Airport, Medulla, Mulberry, Valrico, Dover, Plant City Airport, Winston, Lakeland Highlands, Lithia Springs State Park, Willow Oak and Bloomingdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
